name: Patient Behaviour
description:
A lemmings inspired top-down puzzler

A bunch of patients has accidently taken the service elevator down to the hazardous test-labs with no supervisors around. 🤕
Your goal is to thelp the poor blind/deaf patients of Behaviour-Hospital get out of the test labs. 🏥

Use the fan-blower to push them along. 🍃

The Catapult to throw them around the labs.

Or give them hazmat suits to combat the harzards. ☢️

Now, let's fix their bad decisions!
